title: Person of Interest: Reese VS Bulgarian Drug Dealers
author: POI Fights
comment: Television and Movies usually fall into one of two categories - either ‘good’ or ‘bad’, ‘decent’ or ‘indecent’, but sometimes there is a third category, ‘Out Standing’... Those movies or television shows, you ‘make note of’ - you remember, “Oh, it’s Tuesday or it’s Friday and (name of show) is on!” ‘Person of Interest’ was one of these ‘Outstanding’ programs for me... Thanks for reminding me...
Dude he was so done this whole fight. Like, "kids, come on; just relax." 🤣
JC would be perfect if they wanted to do a serious version of The Green Hornet.  Yes, there's still the problem of a believable Kato.
He makes me want to wear a suit.
description: Fight Scene from S01 X 07: Witness
